options: Please provide a list of 10 affordable and delicious dining options in the city of {city}, {country} which offer a great culinary experience for travelers on a tight budget. From street food stalls to local eateries or any hidden gems. The list should help budget travelers to explore these gastronomic delights without breaking the bank. Return your answer in this dictionary structured form: {{"1":"option_1", "2":"option_2", "3":"option_3"}}. Avoid any accompanying texts and closing phrases.
content: Your tasks are: 1) write a SEO-optimized TEXT containing no less than 8-10 sentenses describing a budget-friendly and delicious food option {option} in the city of {city}, {country} including details about the type of cuisine, any signature dishes etc; 2) summarize and paraphrase the generated TEXT to obtain its short META-DESCRIPTION relevant to budget travellers; 3) based on the generated TEXT make a comma-separated list of the relevant KEYWORDS; 4) think up a creative eye-catching TITLE for the generated TEXT; 5) make a list of three comma-separated LINKS to the web-pages dedicated to the {option}; 6) return your answer in this dictionary structured form: {{"meta":META-DESCRIPTION, "keywords":KEYWORDS, "title":TITLE, "text":TEXT, "links":[LINKS]}}
images: Image of a dish described into this text: '''{text}'''
